sense.gloss: to be obsessive (about), to be overly concerned (with), to fuss (over), to worry too much (about), to be picky (about), to be hung up (on), to stick to
to be particular (about), to pay special attention (to), to be fastidious (about), to insist (on), to be uncompromising
to get stuck, to be obstructed

sdata.j: ↑細↑↓こま↓かいことに|こだわる|な。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑習慣↑↓しゅうかん↓に|こだわる|。
↑彼↑↓かれ↓らは↑何事↑↓なにごと↓においても↑古↑↓ふる↓い↑習慣↑↓しゅうかん↓に|こだわる|。
sdata.e: They stick to old customs in everything.

sdata.j: ↑殿方↑↓とのがた↓が↑細↑↓こま↓かいことに|こだわる|ものではありません。
sdata.e: It doesn't become a gentleman to fuss over trifles.

sdata.j: なぜ、ムスリムの↑人↑↓ひと↓たちは、↑土葬↑↓どそう↓に|こだわる|のか。
sdata.e: Why do Muslims place such importance on burial?

sdata.j: ↑冷静↑↓れいせい↓になれば、|こだわる|ほどの↑事↑↓こと↓でもない。
sdata.e: If you stay calm, it's really nothing to worry about.

sdata.j: ↑得↑↓とく↓しようと|こだわる|と↑損↑↓そん↓する。
sdata.e: If you're too concerned with what you gain, you're bound to lose.
